00077  
00078 
00079   //The following two functions stay connected, blocking other connections, and must be manually disconnected,
00080   //          when the last call is a SendData() or ReceiveData() the disconnection will be done automatically
00081   //These function will also automatically disconnect->reconnect if
00082   //          two reads (or two writes) are called in a row to preserve the data send/receive structure 
00083   int  SendDataAndKeepConnection(void* buf,int length);
00084   int  ReceiveDataAndKeepConnection(void* buf,int length);
00085 
00086 
00087   // Danger! These functions do not connect nor disconnect nor flush the data! be sure that send-receive match perfectly on both server and client side!
00088   int  SendDataOnly(void* buf,int length);
00089   int  ReceiveDataOnly(void* buf,int length);
